LanguageData.VBE_HotCoffeeHigh.stages.0.label: Brewed awakening
LanguageData.VBE_HotCoffeeHigh.stages.0.description: That coffee hit the spot, now let’s get some work done.
LanguageData.VBE_IcedCoffeeHigh.stages.0.label: Icy awakening
LanguageData.VBE_IcedCoffeeHigh.stages.0.description: Nothing better than iced coffee to refresh yourself.
LanguageData.VBE_CaffeineWithdrawal.stages.1.label: caffeine withdrawal
LanguageData.VBE_CaffeineWithdrawal.stages.1.descript: God I'm tired. Everything's so annoying, my hands are shaking and my head is pounding.
